title: Kris Jenner likens Kardashian daughters to Mean Girls in KUWTK
text:
While it's never been short on drama, it was the scenes of a large, chaotic and loving family life that kept viewers tuning back in to Keeping Up With The Kardashians.

But the affection between the five sisters seems to have dimmed in recent years, as fame and fortune have transformed their lives.

Now Kris Jenner is attempting to 'push the reset button', comparing her girls Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian and their Jenner half-sisters Kendall and Kylie to the cast of iconic 2004 movie Mean Girls.

Kris Jenner compares Kardashian daughters to Mean Girls cast and tells Kim 'you fight dirty'... while Khloe reveals pink diamond ring from Tristan Thompson in KUWTK trailer

Not impressed: Kim and Kourtney Kardashian listen to Kris telling them a few home truths

In a new trailer for an upcoming episode of the show, we see Kris inform Kim she 'fights dirty'.

'I feel like the really funny side of you guys outweighed the mean side,' matriarch Kris tells her daughters. 'And I feel like it's gotten a little Mean Girls.'

And in blunt words to Kim, the most famous of the cast, Kris says: 'As much as I love you, you fight a lot dirtier than you used to fight.'

Listen to mom: In a new trailer for an upcoming episode of the show, we see Kris inform Kim she 'fights dirty'

Fall out: The affection between the five sisters seems to have dimmed in recent years, as fame and fortune have transformed their lives

Not mincing words: In one scene we see Kim dismissing the idea of gluten free treats at North and Penelope's joint Candyland themed birthday party

Listening in, Khloe raises her eyebrows in shock at the straight talking.

We also see Khloe ask Kourtney in surprise, of the show that made them household names: 'You would be happy if the show ended?'

Replies Kourtney: 'Yeah, of course.'

We then hear Kourtney insist with venom: 'Kim can be the biggest f***ing evil person on the planet.'

Look what I got! The trailer also sees Khloe receive a ring featuring a pink diamond from her onetime boyfriend Tristan Thompson

Still good pals: Scott Disick tells her: 'Well that's fully like an engagement ring'

Good news? Khloe happily shows off the ring to her friends

As for Kendall Jenner, she tells her sisters: 'I think sometimes, there's a lot of judgement.'

The trailer also sees Khloe receive a ring featuring a pink diamond from her former boyfriend Tristan Thompson.

She tells her friends in one scene: 'Look what Tristan gave me last night, a pink diamond.'

Scott Disick tells her: 'Well that's fully like an engagement ring.'

Bad news: In one scene we see Khloe collapsing to the ground as her mother grabs her arm

Emotional: Kim's voice is heard calling someone 'the most pathetic human being'

Khloe smiles as she insists: 'nope, no.'

The ring was gifted just a few months after she ended their romance, after learning her daughter's father had been unfaithful yet again, this time with a friend of her baby sister.

In other scenes we see Khloe collapsing to the ground as her mother grabs her arm.

Emotional, she gasps: 'You little piece of s**t,' as she falls.

Kim's voice is also heard calling someone 'the most pathetic human being'.

As for Kendall Jenner, she tells her sisters: 'I think sometimes, there's a lot of judgement'
description: Kris Jenner is attempting to 'push the reset button', comparing her girls Kim, Khloe and Kourtney Kardashian and their Jenner half-sisters Kendall and Kylie to the cast of Mean Girls.
